findings.message: Recommends `pnpm --filter @apps/caryina test` as a routine command, which conflicts with repo CI-only test policy (`docs/testing-policy.md`:14-17,30-39). This should be rewritten to avoid local test execution guidance.

States accordion open/close is 'client-side behaviour'; with native `<details>/<summary>` this is browser-native and JS-free. Wording should be tightened to avoid implying extra client runtime complexity.
